SO Statement of Auditor of Public Accounts STATE OF NEBRASKA Office of the Auditor of Public Accounts It is hereby certified that the foregoing are true statements of the appropria - tions made and the moneys expended by the Thirty-fifth Session of the Legisla - ture of the State of Nebraska, up to and including the twenty-eighth day of May, 1917, specifying the amount of each item, and to whom and for what paid, as provided by Section 22, Article III, of the constitution. IN TESTIMONY WHEREOF, I have hereunto set my hand and affixed my official seal this 28th day of .May, 1917. (SEAL) WM. H. SMITH, Auditor of Public Accounts. Attest : FRED C. AYRES, Deputy.
